analysis.description:
AlphaconCrowdsale.initialized (/unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol) shadows:
	- HolderBase.initialized (/unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#150)

BlockIntervalCrowdsale.recentBlock (/unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#1033-1035) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- validPurchase (/unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#1043-1051)

Reentrancy in BaseCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#869-873):
	External calls:
	- finalization() (/unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#872)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#872-873)
releaseRatio in Locker.getVariableReleasableAmount (/unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#608-609) is a local variable never initialiazed

Locker.release (/unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#522-545) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,releasableAmount) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#544)

BaseCrowdsale.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#1003-1007) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#1006)

MintableBaseCrowdsale.generateTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#1573-1576) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_beneficiary,_tokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#1575-1576)

Reentrancy in Locker.activate (/unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#422-440):
	External calls:
	- initialBalance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#428-431)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- activeTime (/unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#434)
	- state (/unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#437)
AlphaconCrowdsale.initialized should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol)

Different versions of Solidity is used in /unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol:
	- Version used: ['^0.4.18', '^0.4.24']
	- /unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#1 declares pragma solidity^0.4.24
	- /unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#1064 declares pragma solidity^0.4.24
	- /unique_chucks/13/0xb9eb59dd4bc2aab1ce475a9261988077973e7ecd.sol#1768-1769 declares pragma solidity^0.4.18
